title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog
description: When searching via Package view selection and dialog, no results are returned.
OB: No search results are displayed when searching via the Package view selection and dialog.
EB: Search results should be displayed when searching via the Package view selection and dialog.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Package view. 
2. Select a package. 
3. Right-click and select 'Search'. 
4. In the search dialog, enter a keyword. 
5. Click 'Search'. 
6. Note that no search results are displayed.
